items.sentence: I think Boston is the best city in the world.
I think I have what it takes to be a manager.
I played tennis yesterday afternoon with Tom.
Is there anything else that I can do for you?
The clerk didn\'t give me the correct change.
Tom has three times as many CDs as Mary does.
Tom has trouble expressing his real feelings.
Actually, Tom was the one I asked to do that.
Shouldn\'t somebody be guarding the prisoner?
Shouldn\'t we be talking about what happened?
Tom told Mary not to put sugar in his coffee.
Tom told Mary that he wanted to study French.
When we\'re done eating, I\'ll do the dishes.
Tom and Mary talked about all kinds of stuff.
I\'ll have to stay here and help Tom do that.
Tom is going to be back from Boston tomorrow.
Tom is going to have to do it all by himself.
Tom is going to need to borrow your suitcase.
You still owe me about three hundred dollars.
I thought Tom didn\'t even work here anymore.
